original: Ekselius, Paul Oskar Georg, lektor, Kalmar, f. 16/4/05 i Alem, Kalmar 1. G. 34 m. Ann-Mari Thunberg. Barn: Jöran f. 39, Gabriella 43. — Stud:ex. i Kalmar 25, fil. mag. i Upps. 29, fil. lic. 34, fil. dr 40, provår i Upps. 35. Res. t. Frankr. 27, Engl. 32, Tyskl. 38. Vik. adj. i Malmö 34, e. o. ämneslär. i Saltsjöbaden 36-39, e. adj. i Halmstad 40, lektor i eng. o. franska v. Kalmar h. a. 1. sed. 40. Skr.: A Study on the Development of the Old Engl. Combinations aht/oht in Middle Engl. (grad:avh. 40).
translated: Ekselius, Paul Oskar Georg, lecturer, Kalmar, born April 16, 1905 in Alem, Kalmar. First marriage in 1934 to Ann-Mari Thunberg. Children: Jöran born 1939, Gabriella born 1943. Education: graduated from high school in Kalmar in 1925, obtained a Bachelor of Arts degree from Uppsala University in 1929, a Master of Arts degree in 1934, a PhD in 1940, and spent study periods in France in 1927, England in 1932, and Germany in 1938. Work experience: assistant professor in Malmö in 1934, substitute subject teacher in Saltsjöbaden from 1936-1939, assistant professor in Halmstad in 1940, and lecturer in English and French at Kalmar high school from autumn 1940. Publications: A Study on the Development of the Old Engl. Combinations aht/oht in Middle Engl. (doctoral dissertation in 1940).

publication.name: A Study on the Development of the Old Engl. Combinations aht/oht in Middle Engl.
